mapper.update: update subject set current_seats = current_seats+1 where subject_no = #{subjectNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from subject where status = 'Y'

select SUBJECT_NO ,CLASS_NO ,SUBJECT_NAME ,NAME as INSTRUCTOR ,TO_CHAR(s.START_DATE,'RRRR/MM/DD') as start_date ,TO_CHAR(s.END_DATE,'RRRR/MM/DD') as end_date ,DAY ,MAXIMUM_SEATS ,CURRENT_SEATS ,FEE from subject s join member on(subject_no = subject) where s.status = 'Y' and sort = 2 order by SUBJECT_NO desc

select SUBJECT_NO ,CLASS_NO ,CLASS_NAME as class_name ,SUBJECT_NAME ,NAME as INSTRUCTOR ,TO_CHAR(s.START_DATE,'RRRR/MM/DD') as start_date ,TO_CHAR(s.END_DATE,'RRRR/MM/DD') as end_date ,DAY ,MAXIMUM_SEATS ,CURRENT_SEATS ,FEE from subject s join member on(subject_no = subject) join class using(class_no) where s.status = 'Y' and sort = 2 and subject_no = #{subjectNo}
mapper.insert: insert into subject ( SUBJECT_NO , CLASS_NO , SUBJECT_NAME , START_DATE , END_DATE , STATUS , DAY , MAXIMUM_SEATS , CURRENT_SEATS , FEE ) values ( SEQ_SNO.nextval , #{classNo} , #{subjectName} , to_date(#{startDate},'RR/MM/DD') , to_date(#{endDate},'RR/MM/DD') , 'Y' , #{day} , #{maximumSeats} , #{currentSeats} , #{fee} )
